content: Quote from:   ➥ Against All Odds & Crypto Sportsbook/Casino [Betnomi Home] & [Thread]  ➥ List of participants [Spreadsheet]Main Info:➥ Posts after 23:59 UTC Sunday will be counted towards the following week.➥ Sr/Hero/Legendary - 0.0001 btc/post (no minimum/max 25 posts).➥ Avatar campaign - 0.001 btc/week (fixed rate)Rules:➥ Posts in local sections will be taken into account.➥ Post bursting is not allowed, moreover it is easy to check with ninjastic.space.➥ Posts that do not carry a semantic load or posts whose content is less than 160 characters will not be paid.➥ I reserve the right to change the rules and disqualify any post and any participant for any reason.➥ There are a few more obvious things that I haven't mentioned, but which I'll keep a close eye on.➥ Adding additional lines into your signatures is not allowed, (if this is not your personal referral link).➥ Excluded boards, (Altcoins, Auctions, WO & Serious, Signature Threads, Press, Politics, G & Rounds & Investor Games, Micro, Off-topic).Application:Code:Username:BTC SegWit Address:Custom Avatars:➥ Each participant in the campaign will be assigned an exclusive custom avatar.➥ I hope this marketing approach becomes a trend  fillipponedarxiaomidkbit98minerjonesmr. xTryNinja1miauRikafipPoker Playermr. xBuchi-88BlackHatCoinerETFbitcoinmr. x5tifthosseinimr93mr. xklarkidansus021willi9974Reserven0ncemr. xvd309Ale88RatimovWhyFhyfoggybseek3rowlcatzmandownbobitaWelsh_______________Bthd____________mr. x____________NeuroticFish____________Maus0728____________Pmalek____________Real-Duke____________TheBeardedBaby____________
